page.title: 13Johnstone "Ma Bit"
page.content:
{ONE PERSON'S VIEW OF JOHNSTONE }
Ma bit's always busy, Cars runing up and doon, Mods on scooters Tooting their horns and playing The Style Council Mothers shouting on their weans Who are oot in the park Playing on the swings or having a game o' fitba The shop squad leaning on the spray painted wa's O' the Packies, Smoking and drinking And being a nuisance. There are no big houses, Or fancy gardens Just council houses with a patch O' grass at the back and front, But the people are nice.
